column17:
Product Description

At first glance the Femme de Mont Blanc reminds you of a serene dusk with a mild breeze and a purple sky. With subtle romantic undertones this 2006 luxury fragrance from Mont Blanc is a unique formulation designed for the sophisticated and independent woman for whom the sky is the only limit. Elegant in its modern Oriental feel this ladies? Eau de Toilette concoction is an elixir full of beauty and mysticism that ravages with its first waft. With an impressive longevity and distinctive sillage the fragrance fascinates with its amalgamation of warm spicy and floral notes to create an intense characteristic aroma of its own. With the sweet fruity top notes of Bergamot Cardamom Cinnamon and Pineapple the Femme de Mont Blanc sweeps you off your feet at the first impression. At the heart of the fragrance lie floral notes like Turkish Rose Jasmine Orange Blossom and Heliotrope. The lasting base notes indulge your senses in a warm and playful sensuality with Raspberry Dark Chocolate Peach Amber Vetiver Patchouli and Musk. The perfume appears in a pretty purple colour and comes packaged in a classy glass vial that reinforces the feminine expression of the fragrance and makes it perfect for exclusive wear.

When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and in turn the way a scent smells on you. For instance your mood stress level age body chemistry diet and current medications may all alter the scents you wear. Similarly factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied.
